H0.text: Lutra lutra is the Latin name of which British mammal. Mink

H1.text: Lutra lutra is the Latin name of which British mammal. Badger

H2.text: Lutra lutra is the Latin name of which British mammal. Weasel

H3.text: Lutra lutra is the Latin name of which British mammal. Otter

A4.text: The Eurasian otter (Lutra lutra), also known as the European otter, Eurasian river otter, European river otter, common otter, and Old World otter, is a semiaquatic mammal native to Eurasia and the Maghreb.

A5.text: The Eurasian otter declined across its range in the second half of the 20th century primarily due to pollution from polychlorinated biphenyls and pesticides such as organochlorine.
